title: 4 Stages of Pandemic Sense Making with COVID19
description:
Sensemaking is a buzzword in the IDW. When conditions change we are forced to alter and re-calibrate how we view the world and respond to it. COVID19 is forcing many of us to do this. What does that process look like? 

Many of us will become new selves in the process. We will change. We will be forced to change. We should observe ourselves through this change and learn about the process. 

Rebel Wisdom Coronavirus Sense-Making https://youtu.be/3--5kcQIkyQ
Wikipedia Sensemaking https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Sensemaking
GK Chesterton Orthodoxy https://amzn.to/2QtAbtg
HomoDeus https://amzn.to/2Ulrpic
Douthat Decadent Society https://amzn.to/2xc5EJS
Tom Holland Dominion https://amzn.to/3a6L9Ng

Click here to meetup with other channel viewers for conversation https://discord.gg/2uUhZBK The link will prompt you to download the software for this free group messaging service. This link updates every 100 users so look for the most recent videos if this link doesn't work.

If you want to schedule a one-on-one conversation check here. https://paulvanderklay.me/2019/08/06/converzations-with-pvk/

If you need the RSS feed for your podcast player https://paulvanderklay.podbean.com/feed/
